public class code {
    static Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int t = sc.nextInt();
        while (t-- > 0) {

    static void solve() {
        int n = sc.nextInt();
        ArrayList<Integer> a = new ArrayList<>();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            a.add(sc.nextInt());
        }
        int ans = 0;
        for (int i = 1; i < n; i <<= 1) {
            ArrayList<Integer> temp = new ArrayList<>();
            for (int j = 0; j < a.size(); j += 2) {
                int x = a.get(j);
                int y = a.get(j + 1);
                if (Math.abs(x - y) != i) {

                    break;
                }
                if (Math.min(x, y) != x) {
                    ans++;

            a = temp;
        }
        System.out.println(ans);
    }
}
